title: Enhancing Business Strategy Competencies: Continuing Professional Development for Physical Therapists: Context-Based Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical therapy techniques and comprehension of medical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can practice three or more rehabilitation techniques tailored to local patient characteristics within six months.
Learners can develop one implementation plan to improve physical therapy services within the local healthcare system by the end of the training.
Participants can write clinical case analysis reports with an achievement rate of 85% or higher during peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
